name: Netflix Movie Data Analysis
desc: Analyzed 25,000+ Netflix movies using Python to uncover trends in genres, popularity, and release patterns. Used Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn for visualization.

name: Vehicle Safety Monitoring System
desc: Built a real-time IoT system integrating CNN-based drowsiness detection, alcohol sensing (MQ-3), and collision detection to improve driver safety.

name: Speech Accent Recognition
desc: Developed a machine learning model to classify English accents using audio from 900+ international speakers. Used MFCC features, SVM and Random Forest classifiers.

name: Dice Challenge
desc: A simple JavaScript dice game where users roll virtual dice and compare results. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Drum Kit
desc: Interactive drum kit using JavaScript and event listeners. Users can play drum sounds with key presses or clicks.
